article_title: How The Largest Obamacare Co-Op Went Broke

article_metadata.description: BY SCOTT HARRINGTON - Many proponents of the co-op program are now stressing the inherent challenges new insurers face to achieve viability. Some have attributed woes to the ACA’s restrictions on co-ops’ marketing and advertising, to cutbacks in federal funding of the co-op program, or both.
article_metadata.author: Capital Flows
